word: EXPERIENCE RECORDED IN ACTS 2 REPEATED.-- WHEN THAT PROMISED BLESSING CAME ON US, AS WE PUT UP OUR PETITIONS TO GOD, WE HAD THE SAME EXPERIENCE AS RECORDED HERE IN ACTS 2 IN REGARD TO THE APOSTLES. WHEN THAT PROMISED POWER CAME UPON US WE SPAKE IN OTHER TONGUES AS THE SPIRIT GAVE US UTTERANCE.
